title: Eureka (CRE211)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the eleventh episode of our second season, Matt Oberg, Heather Lawless, Joanne Solomon and Chad Zimmerman share stories of times they saw the light.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Matt Oberg, Heather Lawless, Joanne Solomon, Chad Zimmerman, Kevin Allison, Random Recipe, Tristeza, Rally Moncrief, A Comedy Sketch by BoF, Millionyoung, Jeff Barr, Go Home Productions)
